name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Starizon AI - AI Agent and Assistant for Efficient Browsing & Automation

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Agent and Browser Assistant for Efficient Browsing & Automation

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔥 Starizon is your all-in-one AI assistant.
Press Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + S to start.

💪 Key Features:
1️⃣ Chat with AI
✔️ AI Chat: Open the Sidepanel to start chatting and easily ask about anything.

2️⃣ Chat & Summarization
✔️ Web Page Summarization: Get summaries without reading the entire web page.
✔️ Web Page Chat: Chat directly with web pages and get answers based on their content.
✔️ Multi-Webpage Chat/Summarization: Chat with or summarize multiple pages simultaneously, allowing you to interact with and get insights from multiple sources at once.
✔️ Document Chat: Upload documents and ask specific questions to streamline research.
✔️ YouTube Insights: Summarize and repurpose YouTube content.

3️⃣ Web Page Automation
✔️ Page Actions: Simply input your tasks in plain language, and automate the browser actions on the page using the AI assistant.
✔️ Replay: Save your executed page actions and replay them for free on similarly structured pages.
✔️ Complex Agent: A page actions agent with cross-page/multi-step reasoning and autonomous decision-making.
✔️ Complex Agent: A page actions agent with cross-page/multi-step reasoning and autonomous decision-making.
✔️ Automated Control Flow: Streamline repeat tasks and looped data processes with intelligent automation.
✔️ Automated Workflow Editor: Design and customize automated workflows with a user-friendly visual editor.

4️⃣ Extract Web Data
✔️ Data Extraction: Chat directly with web pages to extract data from them.
✔️ Data Download: Available in XLSX & JSON formats.
✔️ Replay: Save your data extraction actions and replay them for free on similarly structured pages.
✔️ Scheduled Data Monitoring and Alerts: Web page tracker that automatically refreshes 🔄 any page and periodically retrieves data, monitoring information such as pricing, inventory, and other web elements. Alerts or endpoints are triggered based on rules you set in advance.

🚀 How to Use?
🔸 Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to your toolbar.
🔸 Log into your account or configure your OpenAI API Key.
🔸 Press Cmd/Ctrl + Shift + S to activate Starizon.
🔸 Get started with AI!

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:

📌 Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account?
No, you do not need to have a ChatGPT account to use this extension. You can create an account for free on our website.

📌 ChatGPT is banned in my country. Does this extension work in my country?
Yes, we are available in all countries.

📌 Is it free to use?
Yes, we provide new users with 100,000 tokens and offer a weekly quota of 10,000 tokens for ongoing use. For unlimited access, consider our Pro Plans when you need to scale up.

📪 Contact Us:
Have any questions or suggestions? Please contact us at 💌 support@starizon.ai.

Try Starizon AI now and experience the power of AI assistants.
